name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-modern-version-history
title: Modern Version History
shortDescription: An extension modernizing the version history experience in SharePoint Online.
longDescription: This is an extension of the version history experience in SharePoint Online. It allows you to see the version history of a file in a modern experience, compare different versions, and restore a previous version.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
